critical_principles: The existing heiwahouse.com has a PERFECT aesthetic - don't change it, replicate it exactly
Rustic + modern + Portuguese charm = the brand essence
Let photography do the talking, keep text minimal and warm
The vibe is 'adult playground' not 'luxury resort' - keep it playful and welcoming
implementation_approach: Start with design tokens (colors, fonts, spacing) matching exactly
Build component library that mirrors existing UI patterns
Use existing images and content, don't invent new copy
Test each page against the original for visual accuracy
Prioritize authenticity over innovation - this is a replication with strategic upgrades
what_not_to_do: Don't add heavy animations or flashy effects
Don't change the color scheme or fonts significantly
Don't lose the laid-back, beachy, authentic vibe
